citations.narrative:
A written document of an exercise plan approved by the attending veterinarian was not available at the time of inspection.
A documented and approved exercise plan helps ensure that a dogs' space requirements and exercise needs have been
considered and will be provided. The facility must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan to provide dogs with
the opportunity for exercise. In addition, the plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. The plan must include
written standard procedures to be followed in providing the opportunity for exercise.
To be corrected by: February 12, 2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.8 
   
Exercise for dogs. 
A written document of an exercise plan approved by the attending veterinarian was not available at the time of inspection.  
A documented and approved exercise plan helps ensure that a dogs' space requirements and exercise needs have been 
considered and will be provided. The facility must develop, document, and follow an appropriate plan to provide dogs with 
the opportunity for exercise. In addition, the plan must be approved by the attending veterinarian. The plan must include 
written standard procedures to be followed in providing the opportunity for exercise. 
To be corrected by:  February 12, 2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
End Section
